Text:
Seems like an audio album to me. Can't find anything about a DVD. What exactly is the "visuals"- live somewhere/already released videos?
I'm sorry if sound like a jerk but 2.54 GB is a lot of data usage.
The music is from an audio album.  I make the visuals myself. True 720P HD video requires high data usage.
In perspective, a 90 minute, single layer, standard definition DVD is over 4 GB.  HD h.264 is much more efficient.
